Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Normal
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Halsted, and 119th due to, street blockage near 119th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Halsted, and 119th due to, street blockage near 119th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake at this time.

 Shuttle buses are available between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
